questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A cat

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet indoor scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A person
C) An animal
D) An object

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A building
C) A cat
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) The ocean
C) A window or door
D) A forest

A) A flower
B) A cat
C) A person
D) A book

A) Sleeping
B) Eating
C) Playing
D) Sitting

What is the surface the cat is on?
A) A wooden floor
B) A blanket
C) A table
D) A chair

A) Trees and plants
B) Other animals
C) Buildings and sunlight
D) People walking

D) White

A) White

A) Short
